title: PageRank (Power Iteration)
subtitle: Compute PageRank scores of nodes in a directed graph
code: pr = {u: 1.0 / N for u in adj}
outdeg = {u: len(adj[u]) for u in adj}
new_pr = {u: (1 - damping) / N for u in adj}
diff = sum(abs(new_pr[u] - pr[u]) for u in pr)
additional_information: Power-iteration method for PageRank. Handle dangling nodes (zero out-degree) by redistributing their rank uniformly.
